data.title: McKinley Assassination Ink: A Documentary History of William McKinley's Assassination
meta_keywords: William McKinley Leon Czolgosz Theodore Roosevelt Ida McKinley Pan-American Exposition Emma Goldman assassination anarchist 1901 Buffalo
data.meta_description: McKinley Assassination Ink features full-text primary source documents relating to the assassination of William McKinley and the immediate aftermath of that event, including the succession of Theodore Roosevelt to the presidency and the incarceration, trial, and execution of assassin Leon Czolgosz.
